videoSnippet.title: Just Magnus Things Pt. 2 | Carlsen vs Aronian || Grenke Chess Classic (2019)
videoSnippet.description:
Round 6 Impressions here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xqesOArWVxI

New FIDE WCC regulations here https://www.fide.com/component/content/article/1-fide-news/11567-new-regulations-for-the-world-championship-matches.html

Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Magnus Carlsen vs Levon Aronian
GRENKE Chess Classic (2019), Karlsruhe GER, rd 7, Apr-27 
Queen's Gambit Declined, 4.Nf3 (D37)

1. d4 Nf6 2. c4 e6 3. Nf3 d5 4. Nc3 dxc4 5. e4 Bb4 6. Bg5 c5 7. Bxc4 cxd4 8. Nxd4 Bxc3+ 9. bxc3 Qa5 10. Bd2 O-O 11. Qe2 e5 12. Nb3 Qc7 13. O-O Bg4 14. f3 Rc8 15. Bd5 Nxd5 16. exd5 Bh5 17. c4 Nd7 18. Rfc1 b6 19. a4 a5 20. Qf2 Qd6 21. Be3 Bg6 22. Qd2 f6 23. Qb2 Rc7 24. Nd2 Nc5 25. Qa3 Rd8 26. Rc3 f5 27. Re1 e4 28. fxe4 fxe4 29. Bxc5 Rxc5 30. Nxe4 Qe5 31. Rce3 Rcc8 32. h3 Qc7 33. Nd2 Re8 34. Re7 Rxe7 35. Rxe7 Qd8 36. Qe3 Rc7 37. Re6 Rc5 38. Qb3

The 2019 GRENKE Chess Classic is a 10-player round-robin held in Germany from 22-29 April. The first 3 rounds are in Karlsruhe alongside the GRENKE Chess Open, then after two additional rounds in Karlsruhe and a rest day the last 4 rounds are in the Kulturhaus LA8 in Baden-Baden. The field features World Champion Magnus Carlsen and fellow Top 10 players Fabiano Caruana, Maxime Vachier-Lagrave, Vishy Anand and Levon Aronian.

The time control is 100 minutes for 40 moves, then 50 minutes for 20 moves and then 15 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 1. If players are tied for first place a rapid play-off will take place. Official website: www.grenkechessclassic.com

To those of you who read the description: You are an excellent subscriber! :)
